meaningMnemonic: If the <radical>canopy</radical> comes <radical>beforehand</radical>, it's a <kanji>preface</kanji> for the rest of the canopy.
readingMnemonic: You read the <kanji>preface</kanji>. It just goes on and on and on about <reading>Jo</reading>-Anne (じょ), a short lady the author loves very much.
